cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, 26th June 1917.(Received at India Office, 10 a.m., 27th.)9431. Mahsud operations. On 24th force moving over Shrawanai Passcarried out punitive measures in lower Khaisara Valley, met slight opposition,and rearguard on return to camp at Narai Raghza was followed up as far asShrawanai Pass. In one place enemy attempted to close, and were drivenoff with loss, several killed. Our casualties were: killed, 5 Indians;wounded, 1 Indian officer and 27 Indians ; missing, 1 Indian.
